downloadFile.name: Microsoft Product Placemat for CMMC - Preview Sept 2024.xlsm
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/e/8/a/e8ae0228-e786-423f-b624-1574f01bc493/Microsoft Product Placemat for CMMC - Preview Sept 2024.xlsm

detailsSection:
The Microsoft Product Placemat for Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification (CMMC) 2.0 (Preview) is an interactive view representing how Microsoft cloud products and services may satisfy requirements for CMMC practices.

The Microsoft Product Placemat for CMMC is especially useful when paired with the Microsoft Technical Reference Guide for CMMC. The Technical Reference Guide is available at https://aka.ms/cmmc/techrefguide

DISCLAIMER: The Microsoft Product Placemat for CMMC Level 2 is based upon available information to date and is provided as a sample resource only. Microsoft is not a CMMC accrediting body and thus cannot guarantee any outcome under the formal CMMC review process.
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft Product Placemat for CMMC - Preview Sept 2024.xlsm
systemRequirementsSection:
1. Microsoft Excel
2. A basic understanding of Microsoft cloud services and CMMC practices
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download
2. Save the file to a location on your computer
3. Open the Microsoft Product Placemat for CMMC 2.0 spreadsheet
4. Review the Placemat to view the relation between Microsoft cloud services and CMMC practices
5. Share feedback at https://aka.ms/cmmc/productplacematfeedback

relatedResourcesSection.title: blog: Microsoft CMMC Acceleration Program Update
